scripts.copy-rust: npm run copy-rust_js && npm run copy-rust_wasm
scripts.build: npm install && npm run build-rust && npm run copy-rust_dts && npm run build-ts && npm run copy-rust && npm run copy-html
scripts.install-rust: bash -c "curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh -s -- -y && source $HOME/.cargo/env && curl https://rustwasm.github.io/wasm-pack/installer/init.sh -sSf | sh"
